component.name: Personal History Timeline
component.summary: A database application to manage family memories over a lifetime

description.p: Personal History Timeline is a desktop application designed to help you manage and recall a lifetime of memories. Create, maintain, and revisit your personal history with an intuitive timeline interface.

ul.li: Advanced timeline management with visual timeline display
Interactive timeline with smart event positioning
Comprehensive search tools to find events quickly
Data import/export capabilities for backup and migration
Secure local storage - all data stays on your computer
100% local - no internet required, no data transmission
ul.p: The application offers both a trial version with sample data and a personal version for managing your own history. All data is stored locally on your computer, ensuring complete privacy and security.
